name: What Now?
description:
This is 'What Now?', an interactive digital expressionist game/art piece.

If you enjoyed this game please consider joining my Patreon Campaign

[ arrow keys or on screen buttons ]

It is a the accumulation of a lot of my emotions and overall emotional experiences recently. [ original release April 2014 ]

TRIGGER WARNINGS: ptsd,c-ptsd,social anxiety,anxiety disorder,hopeless,depression, SEIZURE WARNING, OVERWHELMING STIMULUS WARNING, loud repetitive noises.

There is a lot of emotional content in this, please take care of yourself.
